name: Hookshot Hell
description:
A mysterious tower, a hookshot and only one way out: make your way down a colossal construction without falling into the void!

Features

  • A skill-based 3D hookshot platformer 
  • Jump, zip and zoom through increasingly difficult challenges
  • Handle TWO (!) hookshots simultaneously - one to zoom and one to swing
  • Learn advanced techniques like a momentum-based dash to reach the last stages of the tower 

##########

Controls  

[WASD / STICKS] - MOVE
[SPACE / A] - JUMP
[LEFT MOUSE CLICK] - LEFT HOOKSHOT
[RIGHT MOUSE CLICK] - RIGHT HOOKSHOT 

[M] - OPEN MENU TO ADJUST CONTROLS

############

by
Moritz Jäger / @jaegermoritz
